name: Fabian's Monster
description:
Fabian constantly drinks energy drinks, even though his friends tell him to stop just as often. 

(Please, for real, if you’re reading this, you need help)

In this 2D boss battle, play as Fabian as he tries to overcome his addiction. 

Controls:

Attack: Mouse 1/M
Jump/Walljump: W/Space
Move: A/D
Slide: S
